backend/main.mo: Main canister actor handling user profiles, history storage capped at 30 entries, permissions, and Big/Small prediction logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that trims old history lists to a maximum of 30 entries while preserving user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature changes to affected frontend files and components with test coverage metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in history flow, prediction, UI, and infrastructure.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with a loading fallback and script bootstrap for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component wiring history, prediction, connection state, and gated input flow into the UI layout.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches render failures and shows a recovery UI with a reload button.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Empty placeholder file for the login button component.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupD: Empty placeholder file for the profile setup dialog component.
frontend/src/features/auth/useCallerUser: Empty placeholder file for the user profile hook.
frontend/src/features/disclaimer/Disclai: UI card displaying a disclaimer about heuristic predictions and non‑guaranteed accuracy.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryCon: UI controls for adding Big/Small entries, triggering prediction, and handling the 30-entry gate flow with connection and loading states.
frontend/src/features/history/historyTyp: Defines the Big/Small result type and helpers for validating and normalizing input strings.
frontend/src/features/history/useGatedHi: Manages the 30-entry gating logic, unlocking exactly one additional entry after pressing Next and relocking afterward.
frontend/src/features/history/useLocalHi: Maintains local rolling history of up to 30 items with helpers to add, remove, clear, and replace history entries.
frontend/src/features/history/useRemoteH: Empty placeholder file for remote history functionality.
frontend/src/features/prediction/predict: Automated browser check that simulates adding history, triggering prediction, and verifying result or error states.
frontend/src/features/prediction/Predict: Renders prediction results, loading states, initialization/connection messages, and error views with retry options.
frontend/src/features/prediction/useActo: Tracks actor connection readiness, loading, and errors, and provides a retry function via React Query invalidation.
frontend/src/features/prediction/usePred: Handles prediction requests, error categorization, retries, actor readiness checks, and resets when history clears.
frontend/src/features/results/ResultsPan: Displays the latest prediction with timestamp and a compact three-row history of up to 30 items using styled UI components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and predictions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, utility classes, and a loading fallback screen.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, themes, plugins, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current specification, including a rolling 30-item Big/Small history, prediction logic requirements, UI gating rules, and a list of known issues. Also documents architectural notes and legacy feature definitions.
